Description.Title: Lu. longipalpis adult females from Cueva de Lapinha (Minas Gerais, Brasil)

Comment.Paragraph: Wild Lu. longipalpis adult female specimens were captured with CDC traps in a non-endemic Visceral Leishmaniasis Brasilian locality (Minas Gerais, Brasil). The specimens were kept in RNAlater* (Applied Biosystems) until they were processed. In order to capture RNA viruses together with the rest of the associated microorganisms, total RNA was extracted from an individual sample composed of 100 female sandflies. These pooled samples were submitted for high-throughput pyrosequencing.
